scenario_text.value:
It’s been right beneath our noses all this
time. I had no idea this place was here.
Yeah, me neither.

If the Master, Miyuki, and Aoi are really in
here, then I guess this is it. *shudder*
Minoru, are you shaking?
So what if I am? This place is freaky.
Not that I want to run away or anything!

(I’m sure Minoru doesn’t need me to tell him
we can’t run away from this.)

(But now might be a good time to encourage
him.)

(Since Minoru’s into superheroes, it might be
best to use them as an example.)

(Or I could see if a little pain might help
him focus.)

(Then there’s the opposite approach of joking
around. I’m sure Minoru would play along.)
(What should I say to encourage Minoru?)
Heroes get scared too.
Want me to smack you?
Bet you’re just cold.
Heroes get scared too.

You know, heroes do get scared sometimes.
I bet even one of them would be afraid now.

But they’d keep going anyway, right? Isn’t
that what heroes do?

Heheh, you got it, Takuma! You really know
your stuff!

You’re right, sometimes even heroes get down.
They might even start shaking with fear.

But they never let that stop them. They never
run away. Not the ones I want to be like!

They steel their nerves, put on a brave face,
and keep going. So I’m gonna do that too!
Want me to smack you?

Sometimes all you need is a good smack in the
face to get your head in the game!
Huh?!

So get ready, ’cause I’m gonna hit you so
hard it’ll knock the shivers out of you!

Wait, no, stop! You look like you’re actually
gonna do it!

Uh...yeah, I was totally going to do it.
Should I not?

Of course you shouldn’t! Why would I want you
to hit me?
Bet you’re just cold.

Nah, I bet you’re just shivering because
you’re cold, right?
Don’t worry, man. I know what’s up.

Oh, yeah. I mean, it’s so much cooler down
here...not! That’s got nothing to do with it!

You think I’m cold-blooded or somethin’?
A freakin’ reptile?

Haha! If you can still think of a comeback
like that, you can’t be doing that bad.
Heheh... Yeah, I guess that’s true!
Anyway...thanks, Takuma.
Hm? Where’s this coming from?

I guess you just reminded me the only reason
I can stand here now and not run away...

...is because I know you and the others are
there for me.
Hey, I feel the same way.
I’m sure you do!

That’s why it hurts so much that we couldn’t
be there for Aoi when she was struggling.

Yeah...I guess we were never able to make her
feel like she could talk to us.

More likely, we expected too much from her.
She always seemed so put together, you know?

Like a perfect honor student. But maybe
thinking of her that way put pressure on her.

If she felt like she needed to be perfect,
she probably kept things bottled up inside.

Like...she couldn’t afford to let us know how
she really felt?

Yeah, exactly. I’m sure there are some things
she didn’t even share with Saki.

You know, now that you put it that way,
I think maybe you’re right.

So what I’m hoping is that this time, we can
really get her to tell us how she’s feeling.

’Course, if we wanna do that, first we gotta
bring her back to her senses!
You said it!
Now come on, let’s go!

This time, I want to listen better to Aoi, so
she tells us how she’s really feeling.

But first we gotta bring her back to her
senses!
